forward_snippets: We continue to monitor developments, including additional sanctions and other measures, that could adversely affect the Company and/or our supply chain, business partners, or customers.
We believe the long-term outlook for the aerospace industry remains positive due to the fundamental drivers of air travel demand.

9 Table of Contents Our expectations regarding the negative effects of the COVID-19 pandemic and ongoing recovery and their potential financial impact are based on available information and assumptions that we believe are reasonable at this time; however, the actual financial impact is highly uncertain and subject to a wide range of factors and future developments.
We continue to monitor developments, including additional sanctions and other measures, that could adversely affect the Company and/or our supply chain, business partners, or customers.
We believe the long-term outlook for the aerospace industry remains positive due to the fundamental drivers of air travel demand.
